identity.mission: Create a warm, accessible, and vibrant platform for migrants that feels like a community, not a bureaucracy.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Instagram's ease with Airbnb's utility.
Emotion First: Every screen must feel 'welcoming' and 'safe'.
Content is King: Clear, translatable text is the hero.
Zoom In: Focus on faces and human connection.
Negative Space: Reduce cognitive load for stressed users.

rules: Use tight tracking (-0.02em) for large headings.
Use relaxed line-height (1.6) for body text to aid readability for non-native speakers.

colors.theme_strategy: Light Mode First. Dark mode is secondary. The app must feel 'sunny' and 'optimistic'. Avoid dark, moody aesthetics for the main interface.

spacing.base: Use 2x standard spacing. If you think p-4 is enough, use p-6 or p-8.

buttons.primary: rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-bold shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: rounded-full px-6 py-4 bg-white border-2 border-gray-100 hover:bg-gray-50 text-gray-900

cards.style: bg-white rounded-3xl border border-gray-100 shadow-[0_8px_30px_rgb(0,0,0,0.04)] hover:shadow-[0_8px_30px_rgb(0,0,0,0.08)] transition-shadow duration-300

inputs.style: rounded-xl border-gray-200 bg-gray-50 focus:bg-white focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#FF8C42]/20 focus:border-[#FF8C42] transition-all h-12

chat_bubbles.ai: bg-white border border-gray-100 text-gray-800 rounded-2xl rounded-tl-sm shadow-sm

visual_enhancers.gradients: Use subtle mesh gradients for backgrounds: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-orange-50 via-white to-blue-50'
visual_enhancers.shadows: Soft, diffuse shadows. Avoid harsh black shadows.
visual_enhancers.icons: Use Lucide React. Stroke width 2px for clarity. Rounded line caps.

hero_community.alt: Diverse group of friends smiling outdoors

location_paris.alt: Sunny Paris street with Eiffel Tower view

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is #1B262C on light backgrounds. Avoid light gray text.

instructions_to_main_agent.setup: Install 'lucide-react' and 'framer-motion' if not present. Add the fonts to index.html or CSS.
instructions_to_main_agent.styling: Use the defined color palette variables in tailwind.config.js. Override the default shadcn/ui radius to 1rem (rounded-2xl).
instructions_to_main_agent.components: Customize shadcn components to match the 'Rounded & Friendly' aesthetic. Remove sharp corners.
instructions_to_main_agent.layout: Prioritize mobile view. Ensure the bottom navigation is sticky and accessible.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use generic 'AI slop' designs.
